channel.title: Parsing on Living Systems_
channel.description: Recent content in Parsing on Living Systems_

item.title: (E)BNF parser for parts of the Galaxy ToolConfig syntax with ANTLR
item.description: As blogged earlier, I’m currently into parsing the syntax of some definitions for the parameters and stuff of command line tools. As said in the linked blog post, I was pondering whether to use the Galaxy Toolconfig format or the DocBook CmdSynopsis format . It turned out though Well, that cmdsynopsis lacks the option to specify a list of valid choices, for a parameter, as is possible in the Galaxy ToolConfig format (see here ), and thus can be used to generate drop-down lists in wizards etc. which is basically what I want to do … so, now I’m going with the Galaxy format after all.
